ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: VOID
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
They come from an ancient world of fallen men, a place of horrors unimaginable to those who have never seen such things. With their gift of knowledge, they've chosen to toy with other worlds for amusement.\n\nAmong their ranks are those that cannot be bought with gold or silver.
Credits to: Taranchuk - C# Coder Dninemfive - C# Coding Neil Yates - Dead Frontier Greg Taylor - Dead Frontier art VOID - VOID Oddcast - Simon Odz - Art and suggestions Sound Response, Activision, Scott Cawthon - SFX source
